Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19340924]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=6.25 µM), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=6.25 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Pseudomonas fluorescens (MIC=100 µM);Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=50 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.19340924]LC50>200 µg/ml against rabbit red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Shows antibacterial activity against representative Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacterial species, and hemolytic activity against rabbit red blood cells.

Literature.Title: Isolation, characterization and molecular cloning of new antimicrobial peptides belonging to the brevinin-1 and temporin families from the skin of Hylarana latouchii (Anura Ranidae).
Literature.Author: Wang H, Yan X, Yu H, Hu Y, Yu Z, Zheng H, Chen Z, Zhang Z, Liu J.
